ValidationRule.description: When the Closed Reason is marked as Other, require an explanation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", IF( AND( TEXT( Closed_Lost_Nuture_Reason__c ) = "Other", ISBLANK( Closed_Reason_Explanation__c ), Contains( $RecordType.Name,"ReadyTalk")), True, False ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Whoa there! Help us out by providing some details around why we lost this deal so we can determine how to help in the future!
